Description:
Ready to live in or refresh!
In the private and peaceful court in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, Baslar Court is home to a fantastic property. With a large backyard with plenty of opportunities to expand and room to renovate inside, this one is one that would please many. Close to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer, including Bunnings, Lansell Square, Woolworths and Coles, Kangaroo Flat train station along with many parks and walking trails, this home is in a perfect location.
Inside, you will a generous living area with a kitchen equipped with great bench and cupboard space and a large pantry. The living area would be a great space to relax with beautiful floorboards lining the floor and the added comfort of ducted heating and cooling.
All 3 bedrooms are a generous size and all feature built in robes and the family bathroom is complete with vanity and shower bath. The opportunity to refresh and renovate this property is there or if you simply just want to move in and live comfortably then that is an option to.
Outside is one of the major assets of the property. There is a huge amount of yard space which welcomes the option to expand the property or decorate and landscape the yard. Perfect for all the tools or gardening equipment is the garden shed and decorating the yard is various plants and trees. You won't find many other properties with this kind of land size in the Kangaroo Flat area!
A property with plenty of potential in the heart of bustling suburb Kangaroo Flat won't stick around for long. Contact the Ray White team for your first look.
Insights: 1 Baslar Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 12 Wireless Street Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Your New Residential Community
NO BAL's required, TITLES AVAILABLE NOW.
This newly completed land estate in Kangaroo Flat offers everything you need in a new residential community. Located in walking distance to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer including shops, schools, bus stops, train station, sporting facilities and parks, only an 8 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD and on the Melbourne side of town what is not to like? With lots ranging from 304m2 to 497m2 all fully serviced and in a secured private community which offers maintenance of the common areas. Wireless Street Gardens would be a fantastic location for a host of buyers including first home buyers, professionals and retirees. Titles available so the lots can settle as soon as required also with house and land packages available from local builders!!
With only 5 Lots remaining, please contact us today to arrange an onsite inspection.
For further information follow the links to Wireless Street Gardens (WSG) website and the Body Corporate website

Description:
CUSTOM QUALITY HOME ON A MANAGEABLE LOT
Yes, you have the best of both worlds. An easy-maintenance quality home on it's very own title, which is also almost maintenance-free with its synthetic turf in the rear yard and easy-care front garden.
The home is twelve months young and has been custom designed to fit the 366m2 allotment. Boasting three spacious bedrooms; two have robes and the main comprises a full walk in robe and stylish three-piece en-suite plus feature timber vinyl wall - it's a real eye catcher.
Open-plan living including a good sized living area, meals space and the kitchen. The meals has a sliding door leading outside; there is quality timber look vinyl plank flooring throughout, and the kitchen oozes quality with its Caesarstone tops, quality appliances (including dishwasher, island bench and double sink) and overhead cupboards.
The second bathroom is spacious and boasts a separate bath; the laundry has a full suite of built-in storage and the home has a 6-star energy rating.
Inspection will impress!!

Description:
A Classic Cream Brick Home Filled With Charm…
Located centrally in Kangaroo Flat within a few minutes’ walk to; shops, supermarkets, train station, sporting fields, primary & secondary schools, the new aquatic centre under construction and Kangaroo Flat CBD and all it has to offer.
This brick home offers:
• Three large bedrooms, all with built in robes
• Polished timber floors throughout & carpet in all bedrooms
• Impressive modern kitchen with quality cooking appliances, gas cooktop, electric oven, ample cupboards and bench space
• Open plan lounge room and dining area
• Ducted in floor gas heating & ducted evaporative cooling
• Freshly painted inside and out, updated fittings & fixtures throughout the home
• Main bathroom with corner shower, vanity basin & bath plus a separate toilet
• Laundry with cupboard storage and access door through to a cosy sunroom/office/kids play area which is fully enclosed and overlooks the spacious landscaped rear yard
• The rear yard is securely fenced and offers ample room for the kids to play and roam, planted garden beds line the boundary fence and lush lawn area makes for endless enjoyment
• A significant sized storage shed approx. 12mt x 4m sectioned into 4 individual shedding compartments each with an individual door entry
• Single carport with double gates through to shed and rear yard
• Updated gutters and well-maintained terracotta tiled roof
• Landscaped front gardens finished with rose bed garden, lawn and lockable front gate and secure fence
A property filled with warmth and charm ready for you to move straight in and enjoy! Enquire today!
Insights: 19 Graham Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality and Convenience on Queen
Positioned conveniently between Kangaroo Flat CBD and Lansell Square, this modern 4-bedroom home occupies a manageable 454sqm allotment among other desirable homes in a fantastic location.
This property is suitable for a broad range of buyers - families, investors, first home buyers and retirees. Enjoy the accessibility of being within walking distance to all amenities, including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks and entertainment.
This property has been diligently maintained, leaving nothing for the next owners to do except move in and relax. The neutral tones compliment the interior including tiled entrance, passageways and wet areas and carpeted bedrooms and lounge room.
The lounge room and master bedroom are at the front of the property and can be closed off from the rest of the house, creating a cosy retreat. Through the passageway is the open plan kitchen, meals and family area. The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances including 4 burner gas hot plates, 600mm electric wall oven, double sink, dishwasher and a pantry. The meals and family area has sliding door access to the alfresco.
An ensuite and walk-in robe are features of the main bedroom. The 3-piece family bathroom and adjoining toilet are conveniently located near the remaining 3 bedrooms, which all have built-in robes and ceiling fans. The laundry has ample linen storage and external access with a concrete path that leads straight to the clothesline.
There are two split systems – one in each living zone keeping the temperature comfortable year-round. The double garage has a remote-controlled door, with a second roller door providing access to the backyard and convenient access to the home interior.
The paved and fully covered alfresco area is a fantastic addition to this property – complete with café blinds, electric heaters and additional door to keep it cosy in the cooler months, then open the blinds in summer to enjoy the garden views. The gardens have been carefully planned for easy care – the front of the property boasts a stunning row of Lilly Pilly trees and the row of ornamental pear trees along the back fence provide shade, privacy and colour. The meticulously kept lawn and gardens are watered via a fully automated watering system.
The position of this property is perfect - you couldn’t be in a better spot on the Melbourne side of Bendigo. Inspections are most welcome, so call today to arrange a viewing.
NOTE: All enquiries must include a contact phone number.
Insights: 6 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
WALK TO LANSELL SQUARE
Here is a wonderful opportunity to purchase a well- positioned unit in the established Karinya Gardens precinct of Aviva Communities. This 2-bedroom unit features open plan kitchen/dining/living room, kitchen has a gas H/p with under-bench electric oven.
Living room with split system heating cooling, main bedroom also has ceiling fan and built in robes. Second bedroom would make an ideal study / guest room. Low maintenance outdoor area, this frees up your time to enjoy views of native gardens and plentiful bird life from your veranda and living room. Why not maintain your independence, downsize in comfort and live in a secure, very friendly community!
Don't miss this amazing opportunity!!!

Description:
Fantastic 4 bedroom family home
Set in a quiet court handy to both Golden Square shopping and Kangaroo Flat schools and shopping.
With a generous 20sqs of living, this 4 bedroom, double brick home offers space, style and comfort for all.
Boasting hardwood timber kitchen recently upgraded with new appliances, walk-in pantry, breaky bar and commercial grade floor coverings.
Large formal lounge with study area, all new renovated bathroom with new bath, vanity and subway tiles for that added impact, plus gas heating and evaporative cooling for year round comfort.
Main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe, 2 other bedrooms with WIRs and the 4th with a built-in robe.
Re-painted throughout, all new laundry and new carpets.
Outside finds a very spacious 1/4 acre lot, fully landscaped with panoramic views over the area, alfresco, (optional) new kid's cubby house, and excellent fencing with drive through access to the back yard for the trailer.

Description:
Retro revival or contemporary dream has huge shed!
Barely anything has been altered at this address since it was built. But that merely means this particular property has so much scope for either a simple or spectacular make-over. Whether cosmetic or complete, any upgrading could create a retro revival or conversion into a contemporary dream. In the galley kitchen that has extensive benches and copious cupboards, a dishwasher, wall oven and gas cooktop assist at mealtimes. Segregated but not isolated, a servery window is open to the lounge. Depending upon occupant's requirements, the floorplan offers flexibility. With cosy gas log fire and sunny corner window, the L-shaped lounge has plenty of space for table and chairs alongside sofas. If so, the formal dining room could be a 2nd living zone and ducted cooling is another bonus. All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes plus ceiling fans and are serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet. A 2nd toilet has dual access between the laundry and outdoors. That's especially handy to the huge covered BBQ area, 6x9 metre shed and garage with rear roller door in a fully-fenced backyard with loads of room for extension (STCA). Near schools, Senior Citizens and Community Health Centre, it is perfectly placed for families, tradies, commuters and retirees from farming or other larger properties. As incentive for a brisk daily walk, it's only about 1 kilometre from Garlands Cafe and Bakehouse for brunch or dine-out at various eateries at the local shopping precinct where IGA, Aldi, banking, pharmacy and others meet many needs.

Description:
Reap instant rewards or remain and rejoice
Situated to be particularly enticing to commuters, just off the Calder Highway, this property is also positioned to please shoppers. Being only one block from a major shopping centre and many big brand retail outlets such as Bunnings, it's also handy to buses into Bendigo as well as the local train station.
Encased in a timelessly attractive exterior, every room in this red brick residence has generous dimensions, even the laundry! So, you'll be amazed how spacious 130m2 can be with a clever floorplan. A dedicated sunroom, 2 living areas, huge kitchen, family sized bathroom and 3 bedrooms with built-in robes provide plenty of room for the average family.
The convenience of gas without the work of real wood, a gas log fire brings cosy country ambience to this suburban address. Together with ducted heating plus 5 ceiling fans, it supplies the utmost comfort to its occupants.
Recently cleaned and with solar system as well as new guttering installed, the roof and panels top off the residence without detracting from its classic facade. Replacing carpet and curtains would transform the interior, let alone any further refurbishment that can be done as time and budget permits.
A double tandem garage plus a large garden shed sit within a big fenced backyard where there is loads of room for extension (STCA). Ideal for tradies, investors, 1st home, to renovate and sell to reap instant rewards, or remain long term to fully rejoice in the fruits of your labour.
Insights: 12 May Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE FAMILY HOME WITH SCENIC OUTLOOK
Enjoy the peace and quiet of a tranquil forest setting along with all the benefits of being located just five minutes from all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat in this perfectly presented family property. Offering great curb appeal with beautiful landscaping and an immaculate finish, you won’t want to leave this spacious home.
The Dennis Family build at Forest Fields Estate is less than five years old and in pristine condition. A separate shed next to the double garage is absolutely ideal for a buyer seeking extra storage for machinery or a caravan.
Head inside, through double doors, to a grand, wide entry hall. To the right is the master bedroom featuring two robes – a conventional walk-in and an additional walk-in running the length of the room behind the bed. This spacious retreat also includes an ensuite with double shower, double vanity and separate toilet.
Access to the garage is on the left of the main entry, followed by a formal lounge. Past the master is the children’s wing with a separate toilet and powder room, large linen closet and a family bathroom with double access providing the practicalities of an ensuite to one of the three bedrooms – ideal for a guest suite. All three bedrooms feature built-in robes.
Finally, the hall opens into a large open plan living, kitchen and dining room and the dining space extends to a large games room. Behind the kitchen is a spacious laundry with plenty of storage and a glass sliding door providing access to the side of the home.
The stylish kitchen features a huge central island bench, large walk-in pantry, double fridge and microwave nook and modern fixtures and fittings.
Stacking glass sliders from both the living and dining space let in plenty of natural light and completely open up the corner of the home out to the al fresco beyond. This fantastic decked area is under the roofline and wraps around the rear of the house. A contemporary concrete table and chairs are perfectly built to suit the space and add to the contemporary feel.
Stunning landscaping includes paving down a ramp to the lawn area and an easement at the rear of the block features steps leading down to a vegetable patch. Trees providing a screen across the back of the block offer lots of privacy and the Gabion wall panels offer additional screening and zoning of the well-configured space.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating
Modern, high-end appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
Large 6 x 9m shed with 3.2m doors at front & 2.4m at rear, sizeable enough for large machinery or a caravan
High quality landscaping in both front and rear garden by Earthform Landscaping and Outdoor Edge Landscaping
Fully automatic irrigation system
This picture-perfect home is located in a quiet estate, surrounded by forest yet only five minutes to schools, shops, medical practitioners and more. The home is ready to be enjoyed and absolutely ideal for a tradesperson with machinery or trailers, or a buyer looking for the perfect lifestyle and wanting extra space for a boat or caravan.
Insights: 17 Aspera Way, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
NEAT FAMILY HOME IN GREAT LOCATION!
Location is very important when considering buying a home and this three-bedroom home will appeal to many with a childcare centre, primary & secondary schools, shops, transport, sporting facilities, bushwalking tracks all within walking distance and the neighbourhood playground approximately 70 metres away. The home will suit a wide range of buyers from first home buyers right through to investors.
Stepping through the front door, to the left is the master bedroom complete with ceiling fan, walk in robe and ensuite with shower, vanity, toilet and heat lamps that help take the chill off those chilly mornings. To the right is the very comfortable lounge, overlooking the front garden and is a great space for the parents relax or watch TV as this zone can be separated from the rest of the home. Stepping down two steps, you enter the open plan kitchen/dining/living area. The very functional kitchen has plenty of bench space & cupboards, electric wall oven, gas cook top, all in very good order and enough room for a dining table and lounge in the adjacent meals/living area. There is a glass sliding door for access to the rear yard. The other two bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom and a separate toilet. For climate control there is a gas wall furnace & a wall mounted air conditioner in the main living area plus a gas space heater and a large split system in the second living space at the front of the home.
Stepping outside is a paved sitting area, a great place to enjoy BBQ's or socialising with family and friends. The grassed backyard is large enough for the kids or pets to play, with low maintenance established gardens. For secure car accommodation, there is a double carport with roller doors plus the bonus of a 5m x 7m shed/workshop with concrete floor and power which can be easily accessed through gates at the side of the garage, perfect for storing an extra vehicle, trailer, mancave, etc.
A neat home on a 750Sqm block, in a family friendly neighbourhood, with all the amenities you could hope for nearby and only a 10-minute drive to the CBD of Bendigo. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Beautiful Brand New Modern Townhouse in Ideal Location
This newly completed townhouse is a beautiful example of modern living. Stepping into the entry foyer you will instantly be impressed with how spacious the home feels. Neutral tones throughout will appeal to most as will the smart floor plan.
Features include:
Ground floor
• Study just inside the front entrance, ideal for those who work from home
• Huge living room, full of light coming from a highset window
• Open plan dining/kitchen/living.
• The kitchen is comprised of composite stone benchtops, 600mm stainless steel electric oven and gas cooktop, dishwasher,
double sink, corner pantry and plenty of space for dining table.
• Off the dining, through glass sliding doors is a concreted area for outdoor entertaining.
• Laundry and conveniently, a toilet with its own vanity, access from the double garage with remote roller door.
Top floor
• 2nd living area with highset windows
• Main bedroom with ceiling fan, walk in robe and ensuite comprising of double vanity, shower and toilet
• Bedrooms 2 and 3 both have ceiling fans and built in robes
• Main bathroom with bath, shower and vanity
• Separate toilet
Climate control is catered for by way of ducted evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating. The allotment is 251m2 in total, fully fenced and ready for landscaping.
Close to Lansell Square shopping centre, Kangaroo Flat CBD, schools, child care, medical facilities, public transport, parks and recreation areas including the new Kangaroo Flat Leisure Centre when it is complete.

Description:
Home Sweet Home
Positioned conveniently between Kangaroo Flat & Lansell Square, this rendered brick home occupies a manageable 561sqm allotment among other desirable homes in a fantastic location.
If you're seeking a property within walking distance to all amenities including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks and entertainment, then you could not be in a better spot on the Melbourne side of Bendigo.
This classic design has the three bedrooms on the left hand side, bathroom and laundry at the back and living areas on the right. The wide entrance hall welcomes you with the generously sized lounge room to the right. The adjoining open plan kitchen and dining room offers a large space – perfect for families and gatherings. The kitchen offers ample bench space, cupboards, drawers and pantry storage. There’s also a double sink, dishwasher, 5 burner gas cooktop and electric oven.
The bedrooms are well sized – two have built-in-robes. The four-piece bathroom has a vanity, 900mm x 900mm shower, bath and toilet. The laundry has extra storage – drawers and cupboards and is conveniently located near the backdoor. Outside in the fully fenced yard is a covered entertaining area, lawn spaces for children and pets to play, a small garden shed and access to the single lock up garage.
Notable Features:
# Floorboards in hallways, living, dining and kitchen areas. Bedrooms have carpet, wet areas have tiles
# Timber double hung windows
# Two gas heaters – lounge and dining rooms
# Ducted evaporative air conditioning
# Ample storage
# Walking distance to both Kangaroo Flat CBD and Lansell Square
This property could potentially achieve a weekly rental of approx. $300 - $310 per week, giving investors a return of over 5%.
Call today and enquire on this fantastic property.

Description:
Compelling Contemporary Quality
This fresh, fabulous three bedroom, two bathroom townhouse offers exciting , enticing light filled living and dining areas.It is enhanced by a stylish well appointed open plan kitchen including dishwasher, elec.oven and gas hotplates. Stunning polished floorboards. Gas ducted heating and split systems for year round climate comfort. Single remote garage. Own title (no body corporate). A pleasant deck overlooks the fully landscaped gardens. Currently let to a terrific tenant with a lease until Nov 2018 and paying $320 p.w. Conveniently located within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat Primary School, Crusoe College and the near completed Aquatic Centre.
